title: Easy Joystick
description: Our mobile virtual joystick system is designed to offer deep customization in joystick layout, size, color, and position. With the ability to adjust the sensitivity of X and Y orientation, you will be able to have full control over movement in the game.
longDescription:
Preview: Video Trailer // More Systems

Integration with Advanced Locomotion System V4


Our mobile virtual joystick system is designed to offer deep customization in joystick layout, size, color, and position. With the ability to adjust the sensitivity of X and Y orientation, you will be able to have full control over movement in the game. In addition, it allows support for multiple joysticks on the screen, you will be able to play using Joystick with different functionalities in a more interactive way.


Easy joystick also includes 3 different types of Joystick base blueprints: Movement Joystick, Orientation Joystick (Directional PAD) and Shooting Joystick. With unique features like auto fire and shoot at once.


This virtual joystick system supports different types of joysticks working together and event management such as motion start, motion end, while joystick is moving, X axis, Y axis. It also includes the option to create the widgets at design time or directly from blueprints. Clear documentation and commented code will allow you to easily extend and create new joysticks.


New Update 1.6.6.0 (Current Version):

  • Added support for UE5.4
  • Added support for UE5.3
  • Improved optimization in the virtual joysticks.
  • Added support for Multiplayer projects
  • New tutorial Integration Easy Joystick + Vehicle Project


New Update 1.3: Trailer

  • Anchoring System Optimization
  • Floating Mode and Static Mode
  • Manual and automatic size configuration in Static mode
  • Added new Jump joystick
  • Added new configuration for vertical joystick
  • Vertical Screen Setup Tutorial
  • New tutorial on Adding New Joystick Base
  • New Tutorial for using Joystick as a button with camera movement
technicalDetails:
Features:

Allows deep customization of the joystick (design, size, color, position)

Allows you to adjust the sensitivity of X and Y orientation

Support for multiple joysticks on the screen

Floating mode

Includes 3 different Joystick base types:

 -Movement Joystick

 -Orientation Joystick (directional PAD)

 -Shooting joystick:

   -Automatic Fire

   -Fire at once

-Supports different types of joysticks working together

-Includes Event Management: Start of movement, End of movement, While the joystick is moving, Axis X, Axis Y

-Supports 2 creation modes (At design time, and direct creation from blueprints)

-Clear documentation, commented code


Number of Blueprints: 13

Function Library: 2

Number of widget: 9

Number of unique icons: 11 (4 different Joystick styles)

Use Example Project

 

Input: Touch, Mouse

Maps: 1

Supported Development Platforms:

-Android: Yes

-iOS: Yes
